articles.description: Hammer has launched two new smartwatches in India to take on the under Rs 2,000 price segment with features like wireless charging.
articles.content: Homegrown wearable brand Hammer has introduced two new smartwatches, Active 2.0 and Cyclone, in India. While the Active 2.0 seems like a complete Apple Watch Ultra ripoff, the Cyclone features a roun… [+2995 chars]
